Please read all the terms and conditions. 
 
This is a total-free application that allows finding cyclists nearby and sending invitations. Riding a bike on the road can be dangerous, please keep focusing on real time situations on the road while riding. 

 When the visible button is enabled, your real-time location along with history average speed and rating are shared on Google Firebase, your information will be visible by all users within 5km range. All the users within the 5km range can send invitations to you. 

When receiving invitations, please ALWAYS find a safe place to stop the bike, then view the invitation. It's always up to you to accept the invitation or not. Please carefully check the meet-up location is reachable and safe, if not, please refuse. Also, the history average speed and rating of invitation sender will be displayed, please DO NOT accept invitations from an user who is much faster or have a low rating. 

 When sending invitations, please make sure you choose a location that is not too far from each attendance to meet, please ENSURE the meet up location is safe and can be easily reached, please DO NOT race on public roads. You may be responsible for accidents during riding. 

 We are NOT responsible for any accidents during the use of this application, PLEASE ALWAYS KEEP SAFETY IN MIND
